body_html:
When I accidentally tried to assign several tasks to the same node, I got the following error message:
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:206] Initialize HostPortsGrpcChannelCache for job ps -> {192.168.50.35:2223}
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:206] Initialize HostPortsGrpcChannelCache for job worker -> {192.168.50.36:2223, 192.168.50.37:2223, localhost:2223}
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_server_lib.cc:202] Started server with target: grpc://localhost:2223
E0727 11:38:35.762428930 22857 tcp_server_posix.c:284] bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
srun: error: piw25: task 0: Segmentation fault
E0727 11:38:35.762761220 22857 server_chttp2.c:119] No address added out of total 1 resolved
E0727 11:38:37.724595086 21952 tcp_server_posix.c:284] bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
srun: error: piw27: task 0: Segmentation fault
E0727 11:38:37.725087528 21952 server_chttp2.c:119] No address added out of total 1 resolved
E0727 11:38:37.822318646 23426 tcp_server_posix.c:284] bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
E0727 11:38:37.822415468 23426 server_chttp2.c:119] No address added out of total 1 resolved
srun: error: piw26: task 0: Segmentation fault
slurmstepd: error: *** STEP 626.1 CANCELLED AT 2016-07-27T11:40:22 *** on piw28
srun: got SIGCONT
slurmstepd: error: *** JOB 626 CANCELLED AT 2016-07-27T11:40:22 *** on piw25
srun: Job step aborted: Waiting up to 2 seconds for job step to finish.

So it told me the address that I tried to access is already in use.

body:
When I accidentally tried to assign several tasks to the same node, I got the following error message:
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:206] Initialize HostPortsGrpcChannelCache for job ps -> {192.168.50.35:2223}
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_channel.cc:206] Initialize HostPortsGrpcChannelCache for job worker -> {192.168.50.36:2223, 192.168.50.37:2223, localhost:2223}
I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_server_lib.cc:202] Started server with target: grpc://localhost:2223
E0727 11:38:35.762428930   22857 tcp_server_posix.c:284]     bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
srun: error: piw25: task 0: Segmentation fault
E0727 11:38:35.762761220   22857 server_chttp2.c:119]        No address added out of total 1 resolved
E0727 11:38:37.724595086   21952 tcp_server_posix.c:284]     bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
srun: error: piw27: task 0: Segmentation fault
E0727 11:38:37.725087528   21952 server_chttp2.c:119]        No address added out of total 1 resolved
E0727 11:38:37.822318646   23426 tcp_server_posix.c:284]     bind addr=[::]:2223: Address already in use
E0727 11:38:37.822415468   23426 server_chttp2.c:119]        No address added out of total 1 resolved
srun: error: piw26: task 0: Segmentation fault
slurmstepd: error: **\* STEP 626.1 CANCELLED AT 2016-07-27T11:40:22 **\* on piw28
srun: got SIGCONT
slurmstepd: error: **\* JOB 626 CANCELLED AT 2016-07-27T11:40:22 **\* on piw25
srun: Job step aborted: Waiting up to 2 seconds for job step to finish.

So it told me the address that I tried to access is already in use.
